title: Commentary on JBP Mentioning ZaMM & Quality
description:
Peterson mentioned Pirsig's Quality during a lecture. My 2 cents, not a criticism, just putting my interpretation of Pirsig's lens on it. 

Erik Torenberg's excellent Quora synopses of ZaMM & Lila
https://www.quora.com/What-is-the-theme-of-Zen-and-the-Art-of-Motorcycle-Maintenance
https://www.quora.com/What-is-Robert-Pirsigs-book-Lila-about
